text:
TARDIS Destination Mode
When using the Sonic Screwdriver in TARDIS Destination Mode, the Sonic Screwdriver can disable the TARDIS alarms by right clicking any block, you can be inside OR outside your TARDIS
Another thing you can do is force the attuned TARDIS to land by clicking any block with the sonic screwdriver, this can also be done inside OR outside your TARDIS
